body.title: Jockey 3912 Men's Super Combed Cotton Rich Regular Fit Solid Half Sleeve Polo T-Shirt
top_reviews: Bought it for my son. Fits him brilliantly. Good quality fabric. Comfortable fabric to wear. Looks great!
